```{r}
ggplot(data = fdata2, aes(species)) +
  geom_bar()+
  theme_classic() +
  theme(axis.text.x=element_text(angle = -90, hjust = 0))

ggplot(data = fdata2, aes(species, cover)) +
  geom_boxplot()+
  theme_classic() +
  theme(axis.text.x=element_text(angle = -90, hjust = 0))

```
